item.title: UPDATE: Kid Rock Winning MI Senate Race
item.description: If the election were held today, Senator Kid Rock would be a thing. Via The Gateway Pundit: News broke this weekend that Kid Rock is LEADING challenger, Dem Debbie Stabenow in a new poll 30% to 26%! Everyone who wrote this off as a joke, then as a publicity stunt, then as impossible, then as improbable will be forced to say “Senator Rock” soon. Very soon. Try this: https://youtu.be/4KnAzpi4avo Finally, via The Gateway Pundit:
